SpeedMapping — Module

SpeedMapping

SpeedMapping solves three types of problems:

  1. Accelerating convergent mapping iterations
  2. Solving non-linear systems of equations
  3. Minimizing a function, possibly with box constraints

using two algorithms: Alternating cyclic extrapolations and Anderson Acceleration. With recently developed features, SpeedMapping is competitive with similar Julia packages.
